title:
General-order open-shell coupled-cluster method with partial-spin
  adaptation II: further formulations, simplifications, implementations, and
  numerical results
abstract:
This is a continuation of the previous work (arXiv:2403.10128). Additional
aspects such as linear combinations of projections and hash-table
canonicalizations are described. Implementations of the general-order
partial-spin adaptation (PSA) coupled-cluster (CC) method are outlined.
Numerical results are reported.
